documents.document: great stay, fab location Stayed in the Handlery for 4 nights as part of our Honeymoon. the rooms were a great size, we got upgraded to a bigger room with a champange fruit basket waiting for us. The staff were brilliant, very helpful and pointing us in the right direction of were to go in the city. The hotel is old but thats just part of the experiance. the hotel was spotless, the location was out of this world, right next to Union Sq. Would recommend to every one
